title: Pre-Press Staff
company_name: Công Ty TNHH Global Performance Films
job_description:
Tasks and Responsibilities
• Work as a critical communication link between customers, internal teams, and external resources.
• Work as a subject matter expert regarding packaging graphics, workflow, processes, capacity, timelines, etc.
• Responsible for the efficient flow of all customer requests, while monitoring internal/external resource availability in order to ensure that deadlines are met.
• Thorough knowledge of internal procedures and processes.
• Fully understand the packaging graphics process (design, prepress, prototyping, QC) and how it affects printed packaging production.
• Immediately identify potential issues (technical, timing, etc.) and suggest solutions to non-technical clients.
• Understand customer’s complete brand and SKU portfolio, in order to manage digital artwork assets through Esko Web Center.
requirements:
1) College or University degree related to graphics, printing and/or packaging
2) 1-2 years’ experience in a packaging graphics environment
3) Knowledge of printing processes (especially Flexography)
4) Fluent in English communication skills ; proactive, hard work , patience, honesty , team spirit and attention to detail;
5) Excellent organizational skills – detail orientated and process driven
6) Ability to work in a fast-paced environment, continually prioritizing and multi-tasking
7) Good problem-solving skills; ability to identify and execute effective solutions
8) Is an effective team member; supports the team by pitching in at any level and effectively working across the organization to meet the needs of the business
9) Self-motivated and enthusiastic
10) Preferred software proficiency: Apple Mac equipment and operating systems; Microsoft Office Suite (esp. Excel); Adobe Design Suite (Illustrator, Acrobat, Esko DeskPack plugins); Esko
